title: The Story of the Intrepid Bandolero and his Cigars
itunes:title: The Story of the Intrepid Bandolero and his Cigars
description: This week on The Cigar Authority we light up Bandolero Cigars Pack II and Pack III. Plus, 18 years old and not being able to smoke cigars legally? This and lots more on The Cigar Authority!
